• Main Page
Data read out
BMA400

Read our data from the sensor.

bma400_get_accel_data

int8_t bma400_get_accel_data(uint8_t data_sel, struct bma400_sensor_data *accel,
const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to get the accelerometer data along with the sensor-time.
Parameters
[in]data_sel: Variable to select sensor data only or data along with sensortime
[in,out]accel: Structure instance to store data
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev

Assignable macros for "data_sel" :

- BMA400_DATA_ONLY
- BMA400_DATA_SENSOR_TIME
Note
The accelerometer data value is in LSB, based on the range selected.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError
